title: Define System Architecture
description: Outline the overall design of the SmartShelfSystem including hardware components, software stack, and IoT connectivity.

title: Develop IoT Hardware Components
description: Design and build the physical components of the SmartShelfSystem that will communicate with the cloud.

title: Develop Cloud Infrastructure and APIs
description: Create the backend services to manage data from the IoT devices, provide real-time inventory tracking, and optimize product placement.

title: Design User Interface for Web and Mobile Apps
description: Create intuitive user interfaces for both web and mobile platforms to display real-time inventory data and product placement recommendations.

title: Implement Database Structure
description: Design and implement the necessary database structure to store inventory data, product placement information, and system analytics.

title: Conduct System Integration Testing
description: Test the complete SmartShelfSystem to ensure that all components are working together seamlessly.
dependencies: Design User Interface for Web and Mobile Apps

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Evaluate the security of the SmartShelfSystem to ensure that it is protected against unauthorized access and data breaches.

title: Document System Functionality
description: Write detailed documentation outlining the functionality of the SmartShelfSystem for future reference and support.
